headline: Is Truist Financial (TFC) Offering Value After Its Recent 22% One Year Share Price Gain?
summary: If you are wondering whether Truist Financial at around US$50.14 is offering fair value or a potential bargain, it helps to break the story into what the market has done and what the fundamentals may suggest. Over the short term the stock has had mixed moves, with a 0.7% decline over the last 7 days, a 0.5% return over 30 days, a 0.8% return year to date, and a 22.0% return over the last year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns both sit at 24.1% and 22.0% respectively. Recent coverage has...

headline: BNY Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates on Y/Y Growth in NII & Fee Income
summary: BK beats Q4 estimates as earnings jump 20.9% on y/y growth in net interest income, higher fees and rising asset balances.

headline: Jim Cramer Says He Believes in Palantir (PLTR)’s Management
summary: We recently published 9 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Analytics firm Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR)’s shares are among the top performers in the stock market. They are up by 173% over the past year. Truist initiated coverage on the stock on January 6th […]

headline: Can Park Hotels & Resorts (PK) Turn ESG Recognition and RevPAR Tailwinds Into Lasting Pricing Power?
summary: Truist recently raised its 2026 RevPAR growth projections for U.S. hotels and upgraded several operators, while Park Hotels & Resorts released its 2025 Corporate Responsibility Report and scheduled its Q4 and full-year 2025 earnings call for February 2026. Park’s recognition for sustainability leadership and responsible governance, including a Prime ISS ESG rating, may influence how investors assess its long-term positioning within an improving hotel industry outlook. Next, we’ll examine how...
